quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Michael Douglas and Meryl Streep
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, douglas, co-star. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In what state was Michael Douglas born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New Jersey

questions.question: For which of the following movies did Michael Douglas win an Academy Award for best producer?

options.text: One Flew Over The Cuckoos Nest

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One Flew Over The Cuckoos Nest

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sophies choice

questions.question: In 1994 Michael Douglas teamed up with Kathleen Turner to do Basic Instinct.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which one of these actresses is known to have despised Meryl Streep as an actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Katharine Hepburn

questions.question: In how many 1980s movies did Michael Douglas co-star with Danny DeVito and Kathleen Turner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: Catherine Zeta-Jones and Michael Douglas were born on the same day in November but not in the same year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Between 1966 and 2006 Michael Douglas was involved in at least one movie per year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: How many children did Michael Douglas have prior to 1999?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bermuda

questions.question: In which U.S. state was actress Meryl Streep born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New Jersey

questions.question: For what 1988 movie did Michael Douglas win an Academy Award for best leading actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wall Street

questions.question: What is the middle name of Meryl Streep?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Louise

questions.question: Michael Douglas has been married 3 times prior to 2003.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie Falling Down Michael Douglas played a disgruntled postal worker.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jon Stewart

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Wright

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill Hicks

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Madonna

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Andy Kaufman

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Carlin

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Ant bully

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Sidney Poitier and Movie

questions.question: Sidney Poitiers first big break came when he was featured in this famous Greek play.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter Frampton

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lilies of the Field

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Nicholson

questions.question: Which statement concerning Sidney Poitiers birth is true?

options.text: He was born on February 20th in 1927 in Florida.
He was born on February 20th in 1937 on Cat Island, the Bahamas.
He was born on February 20th in 1927 on St. Kitts.
He was born on February 20th in 1927 on Cat Island, the Bahamas.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was born on February 20th in 1927 in Florida.

questions.question: Which statement is untrue about Sidney Poitier?

options.text: When he was 16, he moved to new York to study acting.
While a drama student, Poitier was once the understudy for Harry Belafonte.
Poitier worked as a janitor in The American Negro Theater in exchange for drama lessons.
Poitier came to the USA after graduating from High School in the Bahamas.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Poitier came to the USA after graduating from High School in the Bahamas.

questions.question: Sidney Poitier was named US Ambassador to Japan in 1997.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Raisin in the Sun

options.text: Pretty Maids All in a Row

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: For the Love of Ivy

options.text: In the Heat of the Night

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To Sir with Love

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Archie Moore

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dave Chappelle
